description: Defines a Blits component 'DetailsModal' used to display item details in a modal dialog, including UI elements, styling, and interaction methods.

classes.name: DetailsModal
classes.description: A Lightning.js Blits component for displaying details of an item with actions like close, delete, and electronic signature.

methods.name: close
methods.description: Emits a 'close' event to close the modal.

methods.name: requestDelete
methods.description: Emits a 'delete' event to request deletion of the item.

methods.name: esign
methods.description: Emits an 'esign' event for electronic signature approval, passing the item ID.
